subject: Permision for access to Petrol/diesel/Gas-retail outlets in accordance with the provision of MoRT&H letter No.RW-NH-33023/19/99-DO-III dated 17.0.2003
text: 9T 74l ~TTHI gfeasut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (43t 4Rac- 3T< <TAT TTTT4 ) Extn. 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/21/2002-Admn: September 13, 2004 POLICY MATTERS TECHNIGAL (43/2004) (Decision taken on note of GM(DM)-Il dated 19.08.2004.) Sub: Permission for access to PetrollDiesel/Gas-retail Outlets in accordance with the provision of MoRTeH Letter No. RW-NH-33023/19/99-DO-III dated 17.10.2003 The Ministry of Road Transport & Highways has pointed out several shortcomings and infirmities in the proposals sent for permission for setting up of new fuel outlets. Reports sent by Project Directors often do not conform to the provisions of the MoRT&H Circular No RW-NH-33023/19/99-DO-III dated 17.10.2003. It appears that Project Directors do not take this work seriously and either do not themselves inspect the site or do not compare the site conditions with the drawings provided by the applicant; Some of shortcomings noticed are mentioned in the enclosed list: Project Directors are expected to give proper attention to this matter so that these mistakes are not repeated,. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: (V.K: Sharma) General Manager (Admn) Encl: As above To: AII PIUsICMUs Copyto: 1. AII Members 2. AIl GMs 3 PS to Chairman M #um NHAL
